author: Jay Peters
title: Resident Evil Village on the iPhone could be a preview of Apple’s gaming future
description: Resident Evil Village plays really well on an iPhone, but the game’s graphics aren’t the most interesting thing going on with it — I’m much more excited for what it might be teasing for Apple and Mac gaming in the future.
content:
